review_text: Nice casual spot for sushi and milk tea. Fish tasted fresh and service was quick. Good place for a simple dinner.
I come here often for their rolls and bubble tea. Prices are reasonable and portions are solid.
Food was decent but seating is a bit tight. Better for takeout than dining in.
Great dim sum spot for family gatherings. Tons of variety and everything came out hot and fresh.
Classic banquet-style Chinese restaurant. A little noisy on weekends but food quality is very good.
Dim sum carts move fast and service is efficient. Would definitely come back.
As a vegan, I was happy to find several plant-based options. The vegetable sushi rolls and tofu dishes were fresh and flavorful, and staff was accommodating with dietary requests.
Nice Asian fusion menu with sushi options. Good atmosphere for a casual dinner.
Sushi rolls were creative and fresh. Staff was friendly and attentive.
Food was good but took longer than expected to come out.
Love their steamed buns and dim sum items. Simple, fast, and affordable.
Quick bites and solid flavors. Great place if you want something filling without waiting too long.
Good value for money. The soup dumplings are my favorite here.
Beautiful bakery with amazing pastries and coffee. Everything looks fresh and tastes great.
Good spot to grab breakfast or dessert. Can get crowded in the afternoon.
Consistently good pastries and clean environment. Love coming here to study.
Excellent xiao long bao! Juicy and flavorful. One of the best soup dumpling spots nearby.
Very comforting food and generous portions. A bit busy during dinner hours.
Authentic flavors and quick service. Highly recommend the dumplings.
Best brown sugar boba in the area. Rich flavor and chewy pearls.
Sweet but satisfying. Drinks are made fresh and staff is efficient.
Good quality drinks but prices are slightly high compared to other boba places.
Delicious pho with rich broth and tender meat. Perfect comfort food.
Large portions and good flavors. Service was friendly.
Solid Vietnamese spot. Quick service and fair prices.
Crispy Korean fried chicken with amazing sauce. Always hits the spot.
Chicken is consistently crunchy and flavorful. Fries are also good.
Great takeout option, though seating is limited.
Delicious halal Turkish food. The kebabs were juicy and well-seasoned.
Fast service and filling portions. Good option for a quick meal.
Clean place with tasty food. The rice and meat combos are excellent.
